Infection Prevention Dashboard; Screening without Safepass ID Assessment = Number of observed staff without / Total Observed.  Screening with Safepass ID Assessment = Number of observed staff with / Total Observed.  Staff Mask Compliance = Number of observed staff with mask / Total Observed.  Patient Mask Compliance = Number of observed patients with mask / Total Observed.  Staff Break Room Social Distancing Compliance = Number of staff compliant / Total Observed.;http://tableau/#/workbooks/173/views

Hand Hygiene Monthly Report; Unit Compliance - All Observations = Number of compliant observations / Total observations.  Unit Summary Percent of Goal  All Observations = Unit Compliance as a percent of monthly observation goal of 250 observations.  Role Compliance - All Observations = Number of compliant observations / Total observations.  Shift Compliance - All Observations = Number of compliant observations / Total observations.;http://tableau/#/workbooks/174/views
